title: 112_hr3800
content: The "Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2012" extends fuel and ticket taxes funding the Airport and Airway Trust Fund until February 17, 2012. The Act also extends the expenditure authority of the Trust Fund until February 18, 2012. The Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to change dates, and the Airport Improvement Program is extended with authorization of appropriations until February 17, 2012. The amendment extends various authorities under title 49 of the United States Code until February 18, 2012. The amendment extends authorities under title 49 of the United States Code until February 18, 2012, impacting various sections related to aviation operations. The amendment extends authorities under title 49 of the United States Code until February 17, 2012, affecting funding for Federal Aviation Administration operations, air navigation facilities and equipment, research, engineering, and development, and essential air service. The curr_chunk is about the roles of the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the Vice President of the United States as President of the Senate.
